name: Ultimate Franchise Football GM
description:
Ultimate Football GM is a free offline sport simulation game that offers you the chance to become the GM of a professional football franchise and create a dynasty. Do you have what it takes to become a legend?

The ultimate team, players and career management game.
As a gm, you have complete control on day to day operations:

- Create a football dream team under the salary cap
- Trade or sign football superstars to your team
- Draft and train players to help them fulfil their potential
- Hire coaches and staff
- Handle financial activities
- Manage stadium or facilities upgrades
- Sign sponsors
- Set ticket prices
- Handle player events
- Complete general manager achievements
- Maintain owner and fans expectations.

Superstar players or bargains?
Upgrading franchise facilities or saving money?
Building a squad slowly by drafting a lot or trading and signing free agents your way into a squad of champions?
Recruiting external coaches yearly or teaching yours patiently to build your dynasty?

The choice is yours!
Fulfil your destiny and become a legendary general manager, and build a long lasting football franchise to rule the league.

Your franchise.
Your destiny.
Your dynasty.
